subsection.name: Overview
subsection.p: The exception utility contains a single class ExceptionHelper that provides a set of static methods for generating exception reports that take into consideration a causal chain.
The above code results in the creation of report similar to the following:
subsection.source: ---- exception report ---------------------------------------------------------- An error occured. Exception: org.apache.avalon.util.exception.StandardException Message: Unable to do something due to a error condition. ---- cause --------------------------------------------------------------------- Exception: org.apache.avalon.util.exception.StandardRuntimeException Message: Unable to do something else due to a error condition. ---- cause --------------------------------------------------------------------- Exception: org.apache.avalon.util.exception.StandardError Message: Raising exception because that's what I'm programmed to do. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
